title: TCL S6500 Series 79.97 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart Android TV  (32S6500S)

product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product + 1 Year Additional on Panel
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship. Parts and Labor Cost is Covered in Warranty
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does not Cover Any External Accessories (such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details:
Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void
We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience..The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.HDR Technology: The TCL S6500 Series LED smart TV features HDR technology that enables an improved contrast ratio, vivid colours, and sharp details in pictures. It does so by employing an algorithm that automatically adjusts and dims this TV panel's backlight to enhance the brightness of the images, thereby providing you with a wide range of brightness levels.
product_description.Android TV: This smart TV is equipped with an Android operating system that lets you access a host of applications from the Google Play store and a wide variety of entertaining programs, such as movies, games, TV shows, YouTube, and more.

I am using a TCL 65inch TV for the past 3 years and I am very happy with its performance. I went for the 32 inch TV to hook up to the PC. In the gaming mode,I do not see any lag and the inbuilt speakers mean, I do not need an additional sound card. Using the TV for regular TV, gaming with PC, as well as zoom meetings. Using with PC requires me to sit at a distance but with wireless keyboard, mouse and game controller, it is not a problem.
